overview: Yatish is responsible for the overall performance of the company, including oversight of all operating functions, corporate strategy, corporate financing, strategic business and technical initiatives. Since founding the company, Yatish has raised over $175 million in financing and serves on SOMAâ€™s Board of Directors. Since founding the company in 1998, Yatish has been the guiding force behind the company, having built it to its present capability.
